data.title: Meter To Kilometer Calculator
data.meta_description: Meter to kilometer calculator free online. 1 meter is equal to 0.001 kilometer. Learn to convert meter to kilometer and kilometer to meter easily at BYJU’S.
data.text:
Meter To Kilometer Calculator is a free online tool that displays the conversion from meters to kilometers. BYJU’S online meter to kilometer calculator tool makes the calculation faster, and it shows conversion values in a fraction of seconds.

Kilometer and Meter

A kilometer is a unit of distance in International System of units (SI). It is denoted by km. Km is usually used to express the distance of places or land.

1 Km = 1000 M

A meter is also unit of distance as well as length. It is a SI unit denoted by ‘m’. Meter is used to express distance and length of objects.

1 M = 1/1000 Km

How to Use the Meter to Kilometer Calculator?

The procedure to use the meter to kilometer calculator is as follows:

Step 1: Enter the number of meters in the input field

Step 2: Now click the button “Calculate” to get the conversion

Step 3: Finally, the values of conversions will be displayed in the output field

What is Meant by the Meters to Kilometers Conversion?

As we know that, the SI unit of distance is meter. Meters and kilometers are used to measure the length or distance. The kilometer is unit of length in the metric system equivalent to one thousand meters. Thus, one meter is equivalent to 1/1000 kilometer. Meters are denoted by m, whereas kilometers are denoted by km. Below are the few conversion of units from meter to kilometer.

1 m = 0.001 km

10 m = 0.01 km

100 m = 0.1 km

1000 m = 1 km

10000 m = 10 km

Meter to Kilometer Table

Meters Kilometers 1 m 0.001 km 2 m 0.002 km 3 m 0.003 km 4 m 0.004 km 5 m 0.005 km 6 m 0.006 km 7 m 0.007 km 8 m 0.008 km 9 m 0.009 km 10 m 0.01 km 20 m 0.02 km 30 m 0.03 km 40 m 0.04 km 50 m 0.05 km 60 m 0.06 km 70 m 0.07 km 80 m 0.08 km 90 m 0.09 km 100 m 0.1 km 200 m 0.2 km 300 m 0.3 km 400 m 0.4 km 500 m 0.5 km 600 m 0.6 km 700 m 0.7 km 800 m 0.8 km 900 m 0.9 km 1,000 m 1 km

Kilometer to Meter (KM to M)

To convert value of length in kilometer to meter, we have to multiply the given value by 1000.

1 km = 1000 meters

5 km = 5 x 1000 = 5000 meters

10 km = 10 x 1000 = 10,000 meters

20 km = 20, 000 meters

30 km = 30,000 meters
